text: Eileen Pollock (18 May 1947 â€“ 19 December 2020) was a Northern Irish actress. She was known for her role as Lilo Lil in television series Bread. Pollock was born in Belfast, Northern Ireland. Her career lasted from 1982 until her retirement in 2019. Pollock died on 19 December 2020 in London at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British voice actors Category:British stage actors Category:Actors from Belfast
